restorants.name: Pizzeria Leonardo
restorants.description: The main draw at this local pizza institution is its cute little dining terrace out back, which spills into the gardens of ancient Sveti Nikola Bolnicki.

restorants.name: KANEO
restorants.description: Kaneo Restaurant is situated close to  Kaneo Beach overlooking Lake Ohrid, very close to historical places. For every local person the hardest thing is finding a good local restaurant for eating out, which will be as good as the home cooking and at the same time will offer something extraordinary and different. Restaurant 'Kaneo' combines all these perfectly. Already well known among the locals and the tourists with every season trying to be better and more interesting. Here, you will definitely feel relaxed, calm, and you will enjoy the delicious and tasty food.

restorants.name: Pizza Nemo
restorants.description: Пицеријата „Немо“, еден од најпознатите угостителски брендови во Охрид, отсега и во нов амбиент. На свеченоста присуствуваа пријатели, луѓе од еснафот, голем број гости.

restorants.name: Fish & Lounge Bar Lihnidos
restorants.description: The renomated Fish Reastaurant Ohrid was recently renovated and turned into a modern lounge bar.        Fish&Lounge Bar Lihnidos is best known for preparing the worldwide famous fish which are the Ohrid Trout and Bleak as well as for preparing the most delicious fish stew in Ohrid. Fish&Lounge Bar Lihnidos offers to its guests the possibility to use its capacity for various occasions, celebrations and business meetings.       Located in the very center of the city,this is a great place to experience Ohrid. Fish restaurant has in total 235 seats of which 200 are on the terrace that offers a wonderful view on the Ohrid Square and the lake and 35 seats in the inner part restaurant.
